This package provides following quarto extensions

## Custom Revealjs formats

### Simpleclean
Install the theme:

``` bash
quarto install extension rahuketu86/quarto-ext/custom-format/simpleclean
```

Use these demo slides as a template:

``` bash
quarto use template rahuketu86/quarto-ext/custom-format/simpleclean
```
:::
